item.description:
For this Meet-up we will head to the Trinity Repertory Theater in Providence for an historical fiction interpretation of the events leading up to the Salem Witch Trials.  You may be familiar with the Hollywood movie version starring a young Winona Ryder. Here is the description of the play on their website:

Fear stalks the people of Salem, Massachusetts. Is it the work of the devil? Or has hysteria, malice, and one young woman’s lust started a chain of events that will undo a whole community? Trinity boldly re-imagines this American classic.

Ticket Information

Tickets are $51 plus a $2.00 handling fee. Seating is reserved and tickets are selling fast.  Therefore, I will close RSVPs effective February 22nd and purchase all tickets at that time.  Please note that I will moniter ticket availability online.  If tickets appear to be selling out fast, we may be forced to close RSVPs earlier.

Due to the way Meetup.com handles online payments, we will try something different with this play.  When you RSVP, you will be asked to provide your e-mail address.  I will send you a Paypal Invoice for the ticket price.  If you are not comfortable paying via Paypal, you may contact me and arrange other methods of payment.  Please note, though, that Paypal does provide a secure means for paying by credit card without saving that information online and without having a Paypal account.  It is as secure as using your card at your local supermarket.

Meet-up Logistics

I will be in the lobby at 7:00 and will be holding a small MEET-UP sign.  When you RSVP, I will provide my cell phone number in case you're running late or get lost.
item.how_to_find_us: In the lobby of the theater holding a small MEETUP sign.
item.name: The Crucible
